prop.name: claimReviewed
prop.desc: A short summary of the specific claims reviewed in a ClaimReview.

Review.name: reviewRating
Review.desc: The rating given in this review. Note that reviews can themselves be rated. The reviewRating applies to rating given by the review. The aggregateRating property applies to the review itself, as a creative work.

Review.name: itemReviewed
Review.desc: The item that is being reviewed/rated.

Review.name: reviewBody
Review.desc: The actual body of the review.
